Ex3.Name: Name
Ex3.HealthPenaltyText: This value will reduce what the health penalty on rolls is (Min 0)
Ex3.AttackMacroHint:
This macro will trigger on an attack with this weapon.

If on a split attack it will trigger on the damage roll.
Ex3.PreRollMacroHint:
WARNING: Macros are an advanced feature, improper macro use may break rolls

Macros inputted here will trigger before a die roll, multiple charm macros will trigger in the order the charms were added. Use these for changing data before rolling.
Ex3.MacroHint:
This macro will trigger after a die roll but before anything is done with ther results like displaying the roll or resolving attacks. Use these for advanced dice tricks not covered in the roller. These macros have the following data available

let {results, roll, total} = rollResult;
results: The individual dice that were rolled
roll: The roll object
total: The total successes

Then perform alterations (You can access and edit data in the roller with this.object or this.actor for actor data)
return {results, roll, total};
Ex3.DamageMacroHint: This macro will trigger after damage dice is rolled but before its displayed or automations like initiative or health changes are done.
Ex3.CharacterCreationModePrompt: Character creation mode enabled: can be turned off in the sheet settings.
Ex3.ShowOnslaughtDescription: Targets that are attacked will suffer a -1 penalty to parry and evasion until their next turn.

Ex3.OtherImportHint:
Item Name
Item Description
Tags: Tags will be imported on armor and weapon items, make sure tags are separated by a comma like in the book, Make sure all tags are on the same line.

Item Name Here
Multiple items can be imported at once (requires space between entires)
Ex3.UseLessThen: Numerical values will include all values equal to or less then the selected value
Ex3.DefenseOnDamageDescription: Use Defense values and attack success values on damage rolls, use this when you need abilities to alter defense after accuracy is rolled.  To use set defense to 0 on accuracy roll then input success result and defense value into damage roll.
Ex3.AutoDecisiveDamageDescription: Health damage will be automatically added to characeters hit by decisive attack.
Ex3.AutoWitheringDamageDescription: Initiative damage and initiative gain will automatically be applied on withering attacks against targets.
Ex3.AnimaTokenEffectsDescription: If enables changing anima levels will  add Token Magix Fx to tokens, The default black color will not show up. (Do not enable without the TokenMagicFx Module)
Ex3.AttackEffectsDescription: If enabled attacks will trigger certain animations based on a field on weapons set in the effects tab, can set a preset or copy paste a custom animation location. (Do not enable without Sequencer and JB2A Modules)
Ex3.SpendItemsChatCards: Create a chat card on item spending
Ex3.SpendItemsChatCardsDescription: When an item (charm/spell) is spend or activated it will display a chat card in the window.
Ex3.NonTargetRollCardsDescription: Cards will display every time a character makes a roll.  Not just for targeted rolls.
Ex3.CompactSheetsDescription: Shortens the default height/width of character sheets.  Replaces certain dot values with inputs to take less space (Requires reload)
Ex3.CompactSheetsDescriptionNPC: Shortens the default height/width of NPC sheets.  Replaces certain dot values with inputs to take less space (Requires reload)
Ex3.ShieldInitiativeSettingDescription: Shield initiative is temporary initiative you get at the start of each round.  Its lost before regular initiative is lost and does not count towards turn order or decisive damage.
Ex3.GloryOverwhelmingSettingDescription: Enable the glory overwhelming homebrew rule changes.
Ex3.UseEssenceGambitsDescription: Adds gambits from Essence that are missing from Exalted Third Edition.  Changes: Each gambit costs 1 less than Essence, pilfer does not give any power because that mechanic is not in Ex3, and Reveal Weakness will always half the targets soak until the next successful withering attack against them.  Defense penalties are calculated based off the gambits initiative roll.
Ex3.sortDiceDescription: If selected, the dice roller will sort the results from 10 to 1. Otherwise, the dice will be shown in the order they were rolled.
Ex3.RollButtonTargetDescription: If enabled roll buttons will on the tokens that are currently targetted by the user and if there are no targets will default to the proper character (Attacker for gain withering, Target for Damage).  If disabled it will always use the Attacker/Defender.
Ex3.BankableStuntsDescription: Changes stunts to work like how they do in Exalted Essence.  Stunts are limited to 1 level and can now be banked.
Ex3.DefaultRollStunts: Default tier one stunt bonus on rolls
Ex3.DefaultDefenseStunt: Default +1 stunt bonus on static defenses
Ex3.SheetStyleDescription: The background image used on exalted sheets
Ex3.UseActiveEffectsDropdownDescription: Use a dropdown list for the key in active effects rather than an open input
Ex3.ConfirmDamageRollDescription: Have an extra step in attacks to confirm damage rolls
Ex3.RulesConfigLabelDesc: Various changes to rules in the system
Ex3.UseVirtuesDescription: Allow access to virtues on sheet
Ex3.SteadyActionDescription: Allow the use of the Steady action from Crucible of Legend
Ex3.UnifiedCharacterCreationDescription: Use the unified character creation rules from Crucible of Legend
Ex3.UnifiedAdvancementDescription: Use the unified advancement creation rules from Crucible of Legend
Ex3.SimplifiedCraftingDescription: Use the simplified crafting rules from Crucible of Legend
Ex3.ActivateWithItemHint: Effect will activate/deactive when parent item does.
Ex3.PauseIconDescription: What the pause icon will look like
